this_title: Les Enfants plus forts que la guerre
introduction: In October 2023, French photographer Gregory Herpe and his son, Arthur Herpe, a blogger, traveled to Moldova and the autonomous territory of Gagauzia to teach photography to Ukrainian war refugee children and Moldovan social orphans."It was a wonderful human experience. Sharing with these children who have suffered so much was very enriching for everyone, and they showed a lot of motivation, creativity and joy!"
chinese_title: Les Enfants plus forts que la guerre
